thread.title: ClickBack Phone Cases Unveils Groundbreaking Interchangeable Phone Case
thread.title_full: ClickBack Phone Cases Unveils Groundbreaking Interchangeable Phone Case

author: admin
title: ClickBack Phone Cases Unveils Groundbreaking Interchangeable Phone Case
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/21/2015 @ 5:00 AM Companies mentioned in this article: ClickBack 
LIVERMORE, Calif. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- ClickBack Phone Cases Inc. today announced the world’s first interchangeable phone case with slide-in clickable back inserts so users can personalize the design of their phone without having to remove the entire case. Once the user attaches the ClickBack case, they can swap out and click in more than 100 different pre-designed backs they want within seconds. This Smart News Release features multimedia. View the full release here: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20150921005252/en/ Once the user attaches the ClickBack case to their phone, they can swap out and click in more than 100 different pre-designed backs they want within seconds. (Photo: Business Wire) 
“Consumer phone cases today are either too bulky, low quality, or have one simple design,” said Shane Pope, co-founder of ClickBack. “Many iPhone users own multiple phone cases that they change frequently for a different look. ClickBack phone cases provide the ability for users to change their case without changing their case by simply clicking in a new back. We believe this fills a significant gap in the phone case market.” 
At launch, the ClickBack case will be offered in both black and white and will be available for Apple iPhone 5/5s and Apple iPhone 6/6s. Initially, backs are available in more than 100 different designs. 
“Smart phone users are increasingly looking for their device to be a fashion accessory as much as it is a communications tool,” said Collin Sommerhauser, co-founder of ClickBack. “With its interchangeable backs, ClickBack phone cases gives people the power to easily change their phone case design for any occasion.” 
GREEK LICENSING 
ClickBack Phone Cases has established a licensing agreement with Greek Licensing to offer college sorority and fraternity letters, logos and insignias on its interchangeable phone case backs. Over time, ClickBack plans to arrange additional licensing deals with larger organizations to use popular trademarked logos, symbols and images on its backs. 
PRE-ORDER 
At launch, ClickBack cases will be on sale only on www.ClickBackcase.com for $20 with all backs priced at five dollars. ClickBack has also partnered with Nothing But Nets , an organization that delivers mosquito nets to families in Africa to help stop the spread of malaria. ClickBack will be donating one dollar to this organization for every case that’s pre-ordered. 
ABOUT CLICKBACK 
ClickBack Phone Cases Inc. was founded in January 2015 with the goal of creating an innovative, new phone case design that combines style and protection with simple interchangeability. For more information, go to www.clickbackcase.com . View source version on businesswire.com: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20150921005252/en/ Copyright © Business Wire 2015
